page.title: 20EGERTON YOUTH CLUB KNUTSFORD
page.content: The Egerton Youth Club was founded in 1947 and it was originally for boys.Girls began to go to the club in 1970 and it was made a youth club in 1985. The club has won many awards. Among them is a National art competion in 1977.Gavin Simpson became a national champion at badminton after being a member of the boys club. The membership fee is five pounds per year. This year there are about three hundred members.The club is a member of N.A.B.C and N.A.Y.C.The gym has a five-a-side football pitch, a basketball pitch, three badminton courts, gymnastics and hockey. The club has three snooker tables and two table tennis tables. Outside there are full size football pitches, two five-a-side football pitches and a cricket pitch.{COMPILED BY PUPILS OF {KNUTSFORD COUNTY HIGH SCHOOL.}
